news.title: YouTube Says More Videos Will Be Removed Than Usual for the Time Being
news.description: Reduced office staffing during the COVID-19 pandemic means that YouTube will rely more on automated systems to review content, likely resulting in more videos being taken down.

news.title: Facebook and Twitter Suspend Russian Trolls Trying to Stoke US Race Tensions
news.description: Dozens of accounts based in African countries were disabled after discoveries that their owners were acting on behalf of Russian individuals to inflame racial tensions in the US.

news.title: LinkedIn Introduces Conversation Ads: A New Message-Based Ad Format
news.description: The professional networking platform’s new ad option is designed to help businesses offer more personalized content to customers in order to generate higher quality engagement.

news.title: Slack Unveils Its Biggest Redesign Yet
news.description: Changes to the workplace messaging app’s design include improved customization in the sidebar, a top navigation bar, and other features intended to simplify user experience.
